para1: The ceremony will begin at 18h30 on Saturday 6 June 2020 and the buses will depart from Alonso Martinez at 17h15
para2: Don’t worry if you end up missing the bus, there are plenty of alternative transport options in Madrid (e-scooters, Boris bikes etc.) for you to follow behind.
para3: Regular buses back to the centre of Madrid will be provided, with the first one leaving at around 12.30/1am and the last one at around 5am.
para4: Parking is also available at the venue if you wish to travel by car.
para5: It can get hot during the day in Madrid in June, but the temperature tends to drop once the sun goes down (c.21h30), and we will be quite close to the Sierra. We hope that it will be warm to cool for everyone’s comfort, but if you feel the cold then please bring a pashmina or cardigan as we will be eating outside, weather permitting.
para6link: Average Weather in June in Madrid, Spain
